items.sentence: Tom was surprised when he saw Mary helping John.
Tom was pushed against the wall by his attacker.
Tom was on his way to work when a truck hit him.
Tom wanted to tell Mary why he couldn't do that.
Tom usually wears a hat and carries an umbrella.
Tom used to play the guitar when he was younger.
Tom used to play golf two or three times a week.
Tom took part in the search for the missing boy.
Tom told me that traveling would be good for me.
Tom still hasn't said anything to me about that.
